\catcode`\{=1 % left brace is begin-group character
\catcode`\}=2 % right brace is end-group character

\font\hugo=cmex10
\the\hugo
\hugo
\font\peter=cmex10 at 20pt
\font\hans=cmex10 at 15truept
\font\magnifiedfiverm=cmex10 scaled 2000
\fontname\peter
